project_abstract.cdata: The Fifth Sui Northern Project, which will support the Government's gas development plan designed to increase gas supplies in the country, consists of: (i) the expansion of the Sui Northern Gas Pipeline system to transmit and distribute an additional 70 MMCFD of gas which will be come available to SNGPL; and (ii) technical assistance to upgrade the management and operations of SNGPL.
